name: In the Kuiper Belt
description:
A simple zero-gravity physics adventure game. Set in the future, you are a robot scanning caves in large asteroids in the distant Kuiper Belt past Neptune.

Arrow keys or WASD to move, spacebar to shoot glowsticks.

Still in development: the scoreboard is not hooked up to anything, and I plan on adding 4 more sets of levels and a story.

Link to a git repo of the source soon.

Made for Weekly Game Jam!
